![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/image004.jpg)

**Micron Global Female Mentorship Program** is around the corner.

**Benefit of the program to students****:**

To **be mentored** by Micron global female leaders and **be hired** by Micron at the end of this 8-week program. **Kindly encourage them to apply effective today.**

**Program details and the instructions on how to apply can be found below:**

**Micron Global Female Mentorship Program**

_As a world leader in memory and storage solutions, Micron Technology lives its vision of transforming how the world uses information to enrich life for all__._

With our unwavering commitment to people, communities, and society, we are offering female students all over the world an **opportunity to be mentored by Micron global female Leaders**. 

 **Please note**: To be considered for the program, you need to apply by **January 23, 2022.** 

**What is the Micron Global Female Mentorship Program?**

The program will run in **February – April 2022**. Through a series of weekly mentorship sessions, participants in the Program will learn about the professional world, acquire new skills, find their voice, and get help in launching successful careers. 

**Who can participate?**

The program is open to all female students pursuing an undergraduate or graduate degree in Electrical/Electronic Engineering, Computer Engineering, Data Science, Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning, Mathematics/Statistics, or Materials Science and graduating in 2023 or 2024. Because of the global nature of this program, all participants **are expected to be proficient in the English language.**

#### **How to apply for Micron Global Female Mentorship Program?**

**Write a one-page essay and answer the following questions:**

*   Why are you interested in joining Micron Global Female Mentorship Program?
*   Why you think you should be selected to participate in this program?
*   What do you expect from this program?

For more information about the program and instructions on how to apply, **scan the QR code** below with your mobile device or manually type the URL, then follow the instructions to upload your resume and essay.
